page.title: 18 Jumbo Jet accident
page.content: On Sunday 23rd of June 1985, Jumbo Jet flight 182 vanished from the sky and radar screens. Eight minutes before that the aeroplane was reported perfectly alright but then the plane plunged towards the Atlantic Ocean. Scientists were not sure whether the plane broke up in mid air or just fell. Wreckage was spread over more than 5 miles. Nobody knows for sure what caused the "BLAST" but most people reckon that a bomb was the most likely cause. The speed of the plane was 600mph and had it not been delayed it would have arrived at Heathrow Airport which might have caused more deaths than the 329 people killed already. Over 100 bodies have been recovered so far,and parents and relatives are going to identify the bodies tomorrow.
